faqs.a: About 715 calories per slice for plain cheese.

faqs.q: How many slices in a Costco pizza?
What are the macros for Costco pizza?
faqs.a: Per slice: ~84 g carbs, 30 g protein, 31 g fat; high in sodium.

faqs.q: Does Costco pizza have trans fat?
